title: Strongly correlated photons on a chip
title_cn: 芯片上高度相关的光子
abstract: Optical nonlinearities at the single-photon level are key ingredients for future photonic quantum technologies. Prime candidates for the realization of the strong photon–photon interactions necessary for implementing quantum information processing tasks, as well as for studying strongly correlated photons in an integrated photonic device setting, are quantum dots embedded in photonic-crystal nanocavities. Here, we report strong quantum correlations between photons on picosecond timescales. We observe (i) photon antibunching upon resonant excitation of the lowest-energy polariton state, proving that the first cavity photon blocks the subsequent injection events, and (ii) photon bunching when the laser field is in two-photon resonance with the polariton eigenstates of the second Jaynes–Cummings manifold, demonstrating that two photons at this colour are more likely to be injected into the cavity jointly than they would otherwise. Together, these results demonstrate unprecedented strong single-photon nonlinearities, paving the way for the realization of a quantum optical Josephson interferometer or a single-photon transistor.
abstract_cn: 单光子级的光学非线性是未来光子量子技术的关键要素。嵌入光子晶体纳米腔中的量子点是实现量子信息处理任务以及研究集成光子设备设置中的强相关光子所必需的强光子相互作用的主要候选对象。在这里，我们报告了皮秒级时标之间光子之间的强量子相关性。我们观察到（i）在最低能量极化子态的共振激发下发生光子反聚束，证明第一个腔光子阻止了随后的注入事件，并且（ii）当激光场与极化子本征态处于双光子共振时，光子成束在第二个Jaynes的Cummings流形中，证明了这种颜色的两个光子比其他情况更可能共同注入腔中。总之，这些结果证明了空前的强单光子非线性特性，为实现量子光学约瑟夫森干涉仪或单光子晶体管铺平了道路。

title: Optical flywheels with attosecond jitter
title_cn: 具有阿秒抖动的光学飞轮
abstract: It has been known for some time that the steady-state pulse propagating inside a mode-locked laser is the optical equivalent of a mechanical flywheel. By measuring the timing error spectrum between phase-locked optical pulse trains emitted from two nearly identical 10 fs Ti:sapphire lasers, we demonstrate a record low integrated timing error of less than 13 as, measured from d.c. to the Nyquist frequency of the pulse train, which is 41 MHz. This corresponds to the lowest high-frequency phase noise ever recorded of –203 dBc Hz–1 (assuming a 10 GHz carrier) for offset frequencies greater than 1 MHz. Such a highly uniform train of pulses will enable the synchronization of pump–probe experiments that measure the evolution dynamics of chemical and atomic processes, evolving on femtosecond and attosecond timescales. The ultralow timing jitter of such pulse trains will also allow photonic analog-to-digital conversion of mid-infrared waveforms with a resolution of 6 bits.
abstract_cn: 一段时间以来，已知锁模激光器内部传播的稳态脉冲与机械飞轮的光学等效性相同。通过测量从两个几乎相同的10 fs Ti：蓝宝石激光器发射的锁相光脉冲序列之间的时序误差频谱，我们证明了从dc测量的小于13的创纪录的低集成时序误差。到脉冲序列的奈奎斯特频率，即41＆＃160MHz。这对应于有史以来记录的最低高频相位噪声，用于偏移的＆＃8211; 203＆＃160; dBc＆＃160; Hz ＆＃8211; 1 （假设10＆＃160; GHz载波）大于1＆＃160MHz的频率。如此高度均匀的脉冲序列将使泵探测实验的同步成为可能，该泵测量化学和原子过程的演化动力学，并在飞秒和阿秒尺度上发展。这种脉冲序列的超低定时抖动还将允许对中红外波形进行光子模数转换，分辨率为6位。

title: Optical parametric oscillation with distributed feedback in cold atoms
title_cn: 在冷原子中具有分布反馈的光学参量振荡
abstract: There is currently a strong interest in mirrorless lasing systems, in which the electromagnetic feedback is provided either by disorder (multiple scattering in the gain medium) or by order (multiple Bragg reflection). These mechanisms correspond, respectively, to random lasers and photonic crystal lasers. The crossover regime between order and disorder, or correlated disorder, has also been investigated with some success. Here, we report one-dimensional photonic-crystal lasing (that is, distributed feedback lasing) with a cold atom cloud that simultaneously provides both gain and feedback. The atoms are trapped in a one-dimensional lattice, producing a density modulation that creates a strong Bragg reflection with a small angle of incidence. Pumping the atoms with auxiliary beams induces four-wave mixing, which provides parametric gain. The combination of both ingredients generates a mirrorless parametric oscillation with a conical output emission, the apex angle of which is tunable with the lattice periodicity.
abstract_cn: 无反射镜激光系统目前引起了极大的兴趣，其中电磁反馈是通过无序（增益介质中的多次散射）或通过阶次（多次布拉格反射）提供的。这些机制分别对应于随机激光器和光子晶体激光器。还研究了有序与无序或相关无序之间的交叉机制。在这里，我们报告带有冷原子云的一维光子晶体激射（即分布式反馈激射），它同时提供增益和反馈。原子被困在一维晶格中，从而产生密度调制，该调制会以小入射角产生强烈的布拉格反射。用辅助光束泵浦原子会引起四波混合，从而提供参量增益。两种成分的组合会产生带有锥状输出发射的无镜面参数振荡，其顶角可根据晶格周期性进行调整。

title: Extremely efficient flexible organic light-emitting diodes with modified graphene anode
title_cn: 具有改性石墨烯阳极的超高效柔性有机发光二极管
abstract: Although graphene films have a strong potential to replace indium tin oxide anodes in organic light-emitting diodes (OLEDs), to date, the luminous efficiency of OLEDs with graphene anodes has been limited by a lack of efficient methods to improve the low work function and reduce the sheet resistance of graphene films to the levels required for electrodes. Here, we fabricate flexible OLEDs by modifying the graphene anode to have a high work function and low sheet resistance, and thus achieve extremely high luminous efficiencies (37.2 lm W–1 in fluorescent OLEDs, 102.7 lm W–1 in phosphorescent OLEDs), which are significantly higher than those of optimized devices with an indium tin oxide anode (24.1 lm W–1 in fluorescent OLEDs, 85.6 lm W–1 in phosphorescent OLEDs). We also fabricate flexible white OLED lighting devices using the graphene anode. These results demonstrate the great potential of graphene anodes for use in a wide variety of high-performance flexible organic optoelectronics.

title: X-ray pump optical probe cross-correlation study of GaAs
title_cn: GaAs的X射线泵浦光学探针互相关研究
abstract: Ultrafast dynamics in atomic, molecular and condensed-matter systems are increasingly being studied using optical-pump, X-ray probe techniques where subpicosecond laser pulses excite the system and X-rays detect changes in absorption spectra and local atomic structure. New opportunities are appearing as a result of improved synchrotron capabilities and the advent of X-ray free-electron lasers. These source improvements also allow for the reverse measurement: X-ray pump followed by optical probe. We describe here how an X-ray pump beam transforms a thin GaAs specimen from a strong absorber into a nearly transparent window in less than 100 ps, for laser photon energies just above the bandgap. We find the opposite effect—X-ray induced optical opacity—for photon energies just below the bandgap. This raises interesting questions about the ultrafast many-body response of semiconductors to X-ray absorption, and provides a new approach for an X-ray/optical cross-correlator for synchrotron and X-ray free-electron laser applications.
abstract_cn: 越来越多的人使用光泵X射线探针技术研究原子，分子和凝聚态系统中的超快动力学，其中亚皮秒激光脉冲激发该系统，X射线检测吸收光谱和局部原子结构的变化。改进的同步加速器功能和X射线自由电子激光器的出现，带来了新的机遇。这些光源的改进也可以进行反向测量：X射线泵，后跟光学探头。我们在这里描述X射线泵浦光束如何将薄的GaAs样品从强吸收体转换为小于100ps的几乎透明的窗口，以用于带隙上方的激光光子能量。我们发现正好在带隙以下的光子能量具有相反的效果，即X射线诱导的光学不透明性。这就提出了有关半导体对X射线吸收的超快多体响应的有趣问题，并为同步加速器和X射线自由电子激光器应用中的X射线/光学互相关器提供了一种新方法。</ p>

title: High-efficiency inverted dithienogermole–thienopyrrolodione-based polymer solar cells
title_cn: 高效倒双噻吩并germ-噻吩并吡咯二酮基聚合物太阳能电池
abstract: Inverted polymer bulk heterojunction solar cells have received a great deal of attention because of their compatibility with large-scale roll-to-roll processing. The inverted cell geometry has the following structure: substrate (rigid or flexible)/indium tin oxide/electron-transporting layer/photoactive layer/hole-transporting layer/top anode. Solution-processed metal-oxide films, based on materials such as ZnO and TiO2, are typically used as the electron-transporting layers. Here, we demonstrate enhanced charge collection in inverted polymer solar cells using a surface-modified ZnO–polymer nanocomposite electron-transporting layer. Using this approach, we demonstrate inverted polymer solar cells based on a low-bandgap polymer with an alternating dithienogermole–thienopyrrolodione repeat unit (PDTG–TPD) with certified power conversion efficiencies of 7.4%. To our knowledge, this is the highest efficiency reported to date for polymer solar cells with a device architecture compatible with the roll-to-roll process.
abstract_cn: 倒置聚合物本体异质结太阳能电池由于与大规模卷对卷工艺的兼容性而备受关注。倒置的电池几何结构具有以下结构：衬底（刚性或柔性的）/氧化铟锡/电子传输层/光敏层/空穴传输层/顶部阳极。通常将基于诸如ZnO和TiO 2 的材料进行溶液处理的金属氧化物膜用作电子传输层。在这里，我们展示了使用表面改性的ZnO＆＃8211;聚合物纳米复合电子传输层的反向聚合物太阳能电池中增强的电荷收集。使用这种方法，我们演示了基于低带隙聚合物的反向聚合物太阳能电池，该聚合物具有交替的二噻吩并二萘并吡咯并二酮重复单元（PDTG＆＃8211; TPD），其功率转换效率为7.4％。据我们所知，这是迄今为止报道的具有与卷对卷工艺兼容的器件架构的聚合物太阳能电池的最高效率。

title: Greatly enhanced continuous-wave terahertz emission by nano-electrodes in a photoconductive photomixer
title_cn: 光电导光混合器中纳米电极极大地增强了连续波太赫兹发射
abstract: An efficient, room-temperature-operation continuous-wave terahertz source will greatly benefit compact terahertz system development for high-resolution terahertz spectroscopy and imaging applications. Here, we report highly efficient continuous-wave terahertz emission using nanogap electrodes in a photoconductive antenna-based photomixer. The tip-to-tip nanogap electrode structure provides strong terahertz field enhancement and acts as a nano-antenna to radiate the terahertz wave generated in the active region of the photomixer. In addition, it provides good impedance-matching to the terahertz planar antenna and exhibits a lower RC time constant, allowing more efficient radiation, especially at the higher part of the terahertz spectrum. As a result, the output power of the photomixer with the new nanogap electrode structure in the active region is two orders of magnitude higher than for a photomixer with typical interdigitated electrodes. The terahertz emission bandwidth also increases by a factor of more than two.
abstract_cn: 高效的，在室温下工作的连续波太赫兹源将极大地有利于紧凑型太赫兹系统的开发，用于高分辨率太赫兹光谱学和成像应用。在这里，我们报道了在基于光电导天线的光混合器中使用纳米间隙电极的高效连续波太赫兹发射。尖端到尖端的纳米间隙电极结构提供了强大的太赫兹场增强，并充当纳米天线以辐射在光混合器的有源区域中产生的太赫兹波。此外，它与太赫兹平面天线具有良好的阻抗匹配，并具有较低的RC时间常数，从而可以实现更有效的辐射，尤其是在太赫兹频谱的较高部分。结果，在有源区域中具有新的纳米间隙电极结构的光混合器的输出功率比具有典型的叉指状电极的光混合器的输出功率高两个数量级。太赫兹发射带宽也增加了两倍以上。
